text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/vr-common-library/CodeSystem/CodeSystem-vr-edit-flags
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    0Edit PassedEdit Passed
    1Edit Failed, Data Queried, and VerifiedEdit Failed, Data Queried, and Verified
    2Edit Failed, Data Queried, but not VerifiedEdit Failed, Data Queried, but not Verified

name: PregnancyReportEditFlagsVS
title: Pregnancy Report Edit Flags (NCHS)
description: This valueset contains codes to represent Pregnancy Report Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_PregnancyReportEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=BD25B456-85EC-45D7-B578-1024EE2920F4). Used for MothersHeight, MothersDeliveryWeight, MothersPrepregnancyWeight, NumberPrenatalCareVisits

concept.display: Edit Failed, Data Queried, and Verified
Edit Failed, Data Queried, but not Verified
